description: A classic graphic on a crew sweatshirt made with recycled fabrics. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this sweatshirt made with 100% recycled fabric reduces our reliance on virgin raw materials.
name: Patagonia P-6 Logo Uprisal Crew Sweatshirt - Unisex

specs.value: 11.5-oz 55% postconsumer recycled polyester, 45% recycled cotton knit fleece with a brushed back
